title: Orc Warrior

description.effect: Spawns 1 Orc Warrior in the room.
description.backlash: If not defeated, the Orc Warrior lets out a fearsome battle cry that reduces the defense of all players on the same floor by 1.

flavor_text: A hulking brute wielding a massive battle-axe, the Orc Warrior is a fearsome foe.

title: Necromancer

description.backlash: If not defeated, the Necromancer casts a curse on all players on the same floor, reducing their maximum health by 1.

flavor_text: A master of dark magic, the Necromancer commands an army of undead minions.

title: Fire Elemental

description.effect: Spawns 1 Fire Elemental in the room.
description.backlash: If not defeated, the Fire Elemental sets the room on fire. Each turn, all players on the same floor take 1 damage until the fire is extinguished.

flavor_text: A being of pure flame and fury, the Fire Elemental scorches everything in its path.

title: Lich

description.backlash: If not defeated, the Lich drains 1 health point from all players on the same floor and adds it to its own health.

flavor_text: An undead sorcerer of immense power, the Lich commands legions of undead minions.

title: Goblin Thief

description.effect: Spawns 1 Goblin Thief in the room.
description.backlash: If not defeated, the Goblin Thief steals 1 coin from all players on the same floor each turn.

flavor_text: A sneaky and cunning creature, the Goblin Thief is always on the lookout for easy prey.

title: Chaos Mage

description.effect: Spawns 1 Chaos Mage in the room.
description.backlash: If not defeated, the Chaos Mage casts a spell of confusion on all players on the same floor. At the start of their turn, each player must discard a card and draw a new one.

flavor_text: A master of chaos magic, the Chaos Mage thrives on disorder and unpredictability.

title: Giant Spider

description.effect: Spawns 1 Giant Spider in the room.
description.backlash: If not defeated, the Giant Spider ensnares all players on the same floor in a web, reducing their movement speed by 1 for two turns.

flavor_text: A monstrous eight-legged beast, the Giant Spider lies in wait for unsuspecting victims.

title: Stone Golem

description.effect: Spawns 1 Stone Golem in the room.
description.backlash: If not defeated, the Stone Golem slams the ground, causing a tremor that stuns all players on the same floor for one turn.

flavor_text: A living construct made of rock and earth, the Stone Golem is an unyielding force of nature.

title: Water Nymph

description.effect: Spawns 1 Water Nymph in the room.
description.backlash: If not defeated, the Water Nymph floods the room, causing all players on the same floor to discard a card and draw a new one.

flavor_text: A graceful and elusive spirit, the Water Nymph controls the flow of water to bewilder her foes.
